text: <@U0107JERE9L> Thanks to all those who have been sharing this Handbook to medical professionals   , sharing the invaluable experience with healthcare colleagues around the world while saving the lives of patients. This Handbook contains a number of medical terminologies which makes it difficult for translation by random person. So here I recommended sharing  to healthcare colleagues is more advantageous !!!
